english.segment1: How could we forget, When you touched the earth on that starry night. Angels sang glory to god on high. We remember
english.segment2: How could we forget, The moment the water became wine. Stories of men leaving all behind. We remember
english.segment3: The story burns upon our hearts. A beautiful and binding scar. Forever we will, forever we will think of you
english.segment4: We remember. We remember you O Lord. We remember. We remember you O Lord
english.segment5: How could we forget, There in the garden you cried for it. The city that cursed you and turned you in. We remember
english.segment6: How could we forget, Death has no power and we are free. The good thought of us there on calvary. We remember
english.segment7: The story burns upon our hearts. A beautiful and binding scar. Forever we will, forever we will think of you. Oh think of you
english.segment8: We remember. We remember you O Lord. We remember. We remember you O Lord
english.segment9: O the the things that you have done. And great things you've yet to do. O Jesus we remember you
english.segment10: How could we forget the moment your love rolled the stone away. Our hearts were opened our lives were changed. we remember
english.segment11: How we could forget the promise of hope and that trumpet sound. We'll see your glory roll back the clouds. We remember
english.segment13: We remember you o Lord. We remember you our King. We remember you the Son of God who came to set us free.
